about_the_game:
This is the DLC: "Dev Donation" for Game Of Thrallan with 2 more difficult gameplay such as "Hardcore" and "Nightmare" modes along with a completely new "Boss" character.

A more interesting DLC for Players who want to conquer the game that the original does not have.

At the same time, this DLC is completely unrelated to the commercial nature of the Game, we only call for support to donate the development of the next game of our Team.

Everything is based on the spirit of volunteerism and we also hope that the game will bring everyone a more interesting experience.
